Class InventoryState

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.inventories.InventoryState
public final class InventoryState extends Object
Storage for the current state and location of each player's interactions with this plugin's menus.
Since:
0.1.9

  • Field Details

    • friendResultCache

      @NotNull public final @NotNull ArrayList<UUID> friendResultCache
      A local cache of offline players for this state.
      Since:
      1.1.16

    • friendSearchState

      @NotNull public @NotNull InventoryState.FriendSearchState friendSearchState
      The current state of the friend search mechanism. When adding default friends this should be InventoryState.FriendSearchState.DEFAULT_FRIEND_SEARCH, which will then add the new friends to the current players NBT. When adding friends for a single block this should be InventoryState.FriendSearchState.FRIEND_SEARCH, which will then add the new friends to block's NBT.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • currentPageIndex

      public int currentPageIndex
      The current index of the page, if the inventory has any multi-page capabilities.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • currentFriend

      @Nullable public @Nullable UUID currentFriend
      The friend we currently want to modify with FriendDetailInventory.
      Since:
      1.1.16

    • menuPermissions

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<BlockAccessMenuEvent.MenuPermission> menuPermissions
      The current cached menu permissions for this player.
      Since:
      1.0.0

  • Method Details

    • set

      public static void set(String player, InventoryState state)
      Set's state to the UUID compatible String player. Overrides any previous state.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • set

      public static void set(UUID player, InventoryState state)
      Set's state to the player with UUID player. Overrides any previous state.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • get

      public static InventoryState get(String player)
      Get the state for the UUID player. Might be null, if player is not a valid UUID or there is no state for that player currently.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • get

      public static InventoryState get(UUID player)
      Get the state for the UUID player. Might be null, if player is not a valid UUID or there is no state for that player currently.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • remove

      public static void remove(String player)
      Removes the state for player. This will not throw an exception if there was no state for player.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • remove

      public static void remove(UUID player)
      Removes the state for player. This will not throw an exception if there was no state for player.
      Parameters:
      player - The UUID for the player.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • getBlock

      @Nullable public @Nullable org.bukkit.block.Block getBlock()
      The block that backs the values of the inventory state. If this inventory state is for a user settings inventory, this block will be null.
      Returns:
      The block or null, if not in a block specific inventory.
      Since:
      0.2.2
